item.text: @#/ /'bum ga pa bzhugs so//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga gnyis
pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skyed mched drug nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
med par/ skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye
mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched
drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched
drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dor ba med pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye
mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dngos po med pa
stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
par| skye mched drug dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa stong pa nyid
stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po
stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa
nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
par/ reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po

med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
med par/ reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
med par/ tshor pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems

su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog
ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa
zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang
gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs

pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/

tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
par/ sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med

par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred
pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa 'dus
byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma
dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang do stang pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid
la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus byas stong pa
zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pha la sbyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga
shi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya
bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chos
thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byad de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos
po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong la nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs
la/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang dmigs la/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dbang po rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang dmigs la/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ stobs rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag
kyang dmigs la/ stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
med par/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang dmigs la/ byang chub kyi yan
lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de
dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i bden
pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bsam gtan rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de
dag kyang dmigs la/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la bya ba med par/ tshad med pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ tshad med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de dag kyang
dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
par/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
mngon par shes pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang dmigs la/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom
sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom ste/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang
dmigs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
la bya ba med par/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mi 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang
dag par rig pa da dag kyang dmigs la/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snying rje chen po bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de'ang dmigs la/ snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga gsum pa/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de
ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur te/
sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs po ni/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byad pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o//

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin
gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyi/ 'di la bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan
par mi bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes
zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci
zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes
pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas
kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs
su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang /
gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di
ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod la ni/ byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin/
/khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'du shes
ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba
ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid ni bdag gam bdag
gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /reg ni
bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag
gis stong ngo / /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus kyi rnam par shes
pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg
pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna
ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag
gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rlung
gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ma rig pa ni bdag
gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ming dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /skye mched
drug ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /len pa ni bdag
gam bdag gis stong ngo / /srid pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni
bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni
bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'dus byas
stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /thog ma
dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chos
thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rang gi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mi dmigs pa stong nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong
ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis
stong ngo / /dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag
gis stong ngo / /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni
bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam
bdag gis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa
rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /de ltar bdag
gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ de'ang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du
byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'ang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub
phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med/ nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /
zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
ba las zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad med pa
rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
sbyor ba dang / /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyi sa
mngon du gyis shig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa
'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig pa'i bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ khyod la ci zhig
bya/ de'i don du ni bskal ba grangs med tshad med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig /ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung
du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya
ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba

tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /de ltar byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po rnams su rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga bzhi pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
chub kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang mi skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub la'ang tshig med/ sems can la'ang tshig med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub

lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam la gnas

la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
dpa'i tshig gi don med do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga lnga pa/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi
dbyings la/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do/ /'dus byas kyi khams la/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do/

chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mngon
par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang
gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang gi 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam
par byang ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang gi mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang gi 'byung ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang gi mi
dmigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzugs 'gag pa med pa la gnas
med do/ /gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzugs 'byung ba
med pa la gnas med do/ /gzugs mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /tshor ba 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /tshor
ba kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /tshor ba 'byung ba med pa la gnas

nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'du shes 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'du shes
mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'du byed 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /'du byed kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'du byed 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'du byed mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /

nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag

rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par

stobs rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /stobs rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /stobs rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la

'dzin rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams

rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med

mi 'jigs pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /mi
'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /
rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /so so

pa la gnas med do/ /byams pa chen po 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /byams pa chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med
do/ /byams pa chen po mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /byams pa chen po 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa la gnas

pa la gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /
rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs
shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'du shes shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med
do/ /'du byed shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig shin tu
rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rna ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sna shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lce shin tu rnam par
dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lus shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs shin
tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sgra shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dri shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /ro shin tu rnam
par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /reg shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /chos shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/
de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
mig gi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa shin tu
rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
gnas med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rna ba'i
'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par
dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/
'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yid
kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /chu'i khams

rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'du byed shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas

pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /srid pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /skye ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rga shi shin tu rnam par dag
pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
med do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga drug pa/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag
pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam
par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam
par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par
dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /don dam
pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'dus ma byas stong
bo nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la
mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
gnas med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /ngo
bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de
bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dran pa
nye bar bzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yang dag par spong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shin tu rnam
par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dbang po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /
byang chub kyi yan lag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/
de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /bsam gtan shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshad med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
ma'i gnas med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rnam par thar pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med
do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /mngon par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /ting nge 'dzin shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
ma'i gnas med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /mi 'jigs
pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa la
mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir/ bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan

tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od lag nas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
