rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub gang
yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ gzugs
med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
kyi med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni
gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du bstan pa dang /
lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang
bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba'ang chos thams
cad po de dag nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge
ba zhes bya ba ni/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi
las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos pa dang / dge ba
bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten ba'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /
rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam
par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten

pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /

lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i
chos dge ba zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/
'di ltar/ rab 'byor/ srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ ma byin par len pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'dod pas log
par g.yem pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ brdzun du smra ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ phra ma ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab
'byor/ zhe gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshig kyal pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ chags sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi
dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ gnod sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ log par lta ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /khro ba dang / mdud par
'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung du ma
bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /
gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /khams rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /
rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs
par de ma yin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan
ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang
po dang / rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig
pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong
ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug par
mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes kyang yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam
pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar
bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba
'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan
dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam
par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran
pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o/ /
zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde
ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams
cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha'
mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes
med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang
tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dong ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las
'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs
pa'i chos rnams dang / dran pa nya bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
lag bdun dang / /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
lnga dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol
ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med
pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/
chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ thun mong ma lags pa'i chos zhes bya ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o/ /chos thams
cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor
ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams
cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /de ltar sems can thams cad yongs
su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o/ /bdag gis
ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa
la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du
sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba
pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor pa nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad
sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par
bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya
ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang / bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sems can
thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar
bya'o/ /de nas gzod pa dag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa
rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ /
de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems
mi skyed/ gtso ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ /des
sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems
dang ldan par byas te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di
ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems
can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang
bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag
tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la mos par bya'o/ /chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer
med pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la
dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba sta/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa
zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong
pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gnyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams
la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med
pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar ba rnams la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng+ge rnam par brtse
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam bar lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal
gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rgyal bo ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
la gnas/ 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dpung rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i tshig
la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyogs su rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyag
rgya yongs su 'dzin pha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha'

rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dbang bo'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la

gnas/ rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam
par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas la brten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dri ma med pa'i
sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
gnas/ 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad mi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mi 'pham
pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'jig pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
la gnas/ nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems
gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i
ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par
'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge
'dzin la gnas/ dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge
'dzin la gnas/ gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ g.yo ba med pa'i ting nge
'dzin la gnas/ yul las rgal pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
dge ba'i ma tog rgyas shing bsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge
'dzin la gnas/ gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa gcig
tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa 'dor ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i
ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mngon
par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i
ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin pa la gnas/ gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa'i ting nge
'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma med ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi 'od kyi
ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdul
med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams
cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems
med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sems can gyi phul po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur
bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed
pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga bdun pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i
bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ don gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig /shA radwa ta'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang /

gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyes bur lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / shed can tu lta ba rab tu spang bo dang / shed bdag tu lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed

du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du 'jug pa por
lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu

spang ba dang / yod par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang

ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba

dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang
ba dang / stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden
par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshad med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
rnam par thar bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /

smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying

rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par

bya ba lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos kyi
'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
bgyid de/ /de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
ror lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba
yin/ sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes par
lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus
te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar
lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sa'i khams
su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ me'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nam mkha'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ming dang gzugs su lta
bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye mched drug du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sred par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ len par lta bar 'gyur ba
yin/ srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par
lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba
yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa
nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar
'gyur ba yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi mtshan
nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar
'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshad med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba
yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur ba
yin/ snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dge 'dun du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos kyi
'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
ba skyed do/ /'du shes su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes par
dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /snar
dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid
du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
do/ /drir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ror dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /reg tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
do/ /chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes par
dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs
shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
lta ba skyed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
ba skyed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
chu'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rlung gi khams su dmigs
shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /nam mkha'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ma rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes par dmigs
shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ming dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye mched drug tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
skyed do/ /reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sred par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
ba skyed do/ /len par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rga shir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshul khrims kyi
pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs

shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /phyi nang
stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /thog
ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rang bzhin
stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dngos po med
pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yang dag par spong bar dmigs
shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dbang por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
skyed do/ /stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bsam gtan du dmigs
shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshad med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mngon par shes par dmigs shing
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzungs kyi sgor dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mi 'jigs par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /so so yang dag par rig
par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byams pa chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /snying rje chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byang chub tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dge 'dun du dmigs shing
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta ba dang / 'du shes su lta ba dang /
'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta ba dang / snar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang / lus su lta ba dang / yid
du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta ba dang / drir lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta par 'gyur ba yin/ de'i
phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam
par shes par lta ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te
reg par lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyan gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta
ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i
khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir ma rig
par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs su lta ba dang / skye mched drug tu lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar
lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang / len par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang / skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur
ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi

nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta
ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag
par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba
dang / lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad med par lta ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
par lta ba dang / rnam par thar bar lta ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta
ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs
par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir
sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba
dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de
la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi
sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma
mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la'ang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/
chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par
rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun
nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /byang chub kyi sems med do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi sems med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud pa med
pa/ de lta bu'i sems la'ang chags pa med do/ zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bas na gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /
'du shes kyang chags pa med do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /mig kyang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'ang chags
pa med do/ /sna'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'ang chags pa med do/ /lus kyang chags pa med do/ /yid kyang chags pa med do/ /gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /sgra'ang chags pa
med do/ /dri'ang chags pa med do/ /ro'ang chags pa med do/ /reg kyang chags pa med do/ /chos kyang chags pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i
rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa
med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg
pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /sa'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /chu'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /me'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /rlung gi khams kyang chags pa med do/ /
nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /ma rig pa'ang chags pa med do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes
pa'ang chags pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /skye mched drug kyang chags pa med do/ /reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /sred
pa'ang chags pa med do/ /len pa'ang chags pa med do/ /srid pa'ang chags pa med do/ /skye ba'ang chags pa med do/ /rga shi'ang chags pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
chags pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med
do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags
pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /don dam pa
stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa
med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /chos thams cad
stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa
med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /yang
dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do//
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /
bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang
chags pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang chags pa
med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
kyang chags pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'ang chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
chags pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /'du shes kyang chags
pa med do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /mig kyang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'ang chags pa med do/ /sna'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'ang
chags pa med do/ /lus kyang chags pa med do/ /yid kyang chags pa med do/ /gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /sgra'ang chags pa med do/ /dri'ang chags pa med do/ /
ro'ang chags pa med do/ /reg kyang chags pa med do/ /chos kyang chags pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /
sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa
med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags
pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /
rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang
chags pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /sa'i khams kyang chags
pa med do/ /chu'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /me'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /rlung gi khams kyang chags pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i
khams kyang chags pa med do/ /ma rig pa'ang chags pa med do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /skye
mched drug kyang chags pa med do/ /reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /sred pa'ang chags pa med do/ /len pa'ang chags pa med do/ /srid pa'ang chags pa
med do/ /skye ba'ang chags pa med do/ /rga shi'ang chags pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /bzod
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags
pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags
pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang
chags pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
chags pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /dbang
po rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang chags pa
med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang chags pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /
gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
kyang chags pa med do/ /byams pa chen po'ang chags pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'ang chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid
kyang chags pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ khyod kyis 'di skad
du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de'ang zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ der yang ma zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo
rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo
rnams kyis sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de lta yin na gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /mig kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rna ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa
med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sna'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /lce'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs
su chud pa med do/ /lus kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /yid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /
gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sgra'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /dri'ang rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /ro'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /reg kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /chos kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong
pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes
pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa
med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag
pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med
do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med
cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su
chud pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing

khongs su chud pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /chu'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /me'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rlung gi khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /ma rig pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi

pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa
med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin

pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang

med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag

'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs

byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa
