rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa
med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/
mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/
yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos
par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/
gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna
tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam
mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa
thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams
cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na
yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/
rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par
dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba
can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral pas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis
myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la
nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang
snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod
pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par
byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs
pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan
pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin
tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur
cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas
skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du
shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam
par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang pa'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/
ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/
mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/
yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par
spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu
bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de btang snyoms
dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig
rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i
chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa
dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga'
ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas
te/ /bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med
pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde
ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi
'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam
mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas
so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod
do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de
dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi nga ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
de dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas
kyi sa'ang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam
par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa
dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan
bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med
pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i
rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing /
de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/
rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa
dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang po lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
cad du bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom
pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa dang /
rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po bsgom pa
dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid bsgom pa
dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do/ /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying
rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/ /dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/ /btang snyoms
kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa
rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam
par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba
'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab
tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad
med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi
ro myong bar byed pa'ang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi
ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang dag par 'jug
par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes
kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes
kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma
med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/
chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes

kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi
rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /bdag med ces bya bar shes pa
mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / stong zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi stong zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma yod
ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mtshan ma med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / smon pa yod ces bya bar shes par mi 'jug /smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
ti'i bu/ 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
pa chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'di la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'dod pa'i khams
su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang med pa ste/
tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang /
'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa'ang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag
pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/

'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa'ang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/
yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /

tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bzod
pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang
chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par

gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
gnas kyang / des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang /
'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi
dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom
pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du
de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du
de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom
pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye
bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang
dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
dbang po lnga bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga
bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa
bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi
bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo/ /rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
dgu bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom
pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes
bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'du shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
tsam du zad do/ /'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
tsam du zad do/ /mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rna ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad
do/ /sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /lce dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /lus dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni
ming tsam du zad do/ /sgra dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dri dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dri zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ro dmigs su med
pa'i phyir/ ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /reg dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ reg ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos zhes bya ba 'di
ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med
pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad
do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam par
shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa
dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
zad do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg
pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi 'dus te reg
pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes
bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
zad do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yid
kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sa'i khams dmigs
su med pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chu'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /me'i khams
dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ me'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rlung gi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams zhas bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
nam mkha'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par
shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ma rig pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed ces
bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ming dang gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ming
dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /skye mched drug dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ skye mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ reg
pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sred pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni
ming tsam du zad do/ /len pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /srid pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rga shi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs
su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/

phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs
su med pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa

nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs

su med pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya
ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i
phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rang
gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa stong

pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs

su med pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba
'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yang dag par
spong ba rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dbang po rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ stobs
lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i
lam rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /bsam gtan rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshad med
pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya pa 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di
ni ming tsam du zad do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /so so yang
dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /snying rje chen po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba
'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming
tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ma nor ba de bzhin
nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos nyid
dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos kyi
gnas nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos skyon med pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos skyon med pa nyid zhes bya ba
'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang
chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan
pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
pa/ /bam po drug cu pa/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par
shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang
'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du
shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can
rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsam shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma
gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa de dang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis
bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjed pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su sgrog pa mdzad do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi
'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/
theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes
grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa
mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs
su brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod
pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya
ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa
mdzad do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /
'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad
do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi
khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na
med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos
kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i
mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa
sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ go cha chen po bgos so/ /go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan
'das/ ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go
cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ stong pa nyid
stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ don dam ba stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/
chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/
dbang po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos/ lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam
gtan gyi go cha bgos/ tshad med pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos/ ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/
gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /shar lho'i

phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas
par 'gengs so/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma

snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug
tu rab tu bskyod do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde
ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ byol song gi skye
gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog /chos kyi sgra sgrog /dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems
can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu
des sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma
mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems
can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams
kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar
bai DUR+Ya'i rgyu las byung pa mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul pa byed do/ /de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi
sbyin pa byed do/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do/ /bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do/ /gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed
do/ /me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do/ /phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do/ /spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /byug pa 'dod pa rnams la
byug pa'i sbyin pa byed do/ /mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do/ /khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do/ /'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do/ /yo

byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung
dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa
byed pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ skom 'dod pa la skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa byin/
gos 'dod pa la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa la

mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu

tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul byin pa
nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can
de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab
'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang
po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la
ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal
cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/

nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byang byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams
la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam
du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/
skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa
rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni sbos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni

khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byang byin/ nor bu dang /
mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser
dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung
na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / ched du bsams te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing de 'khor
los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan
pa de dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor
'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang /
tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/
bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i
bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i
chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /
rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing
rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad
bdag la rdo dang / dbyig pas brdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go cha bgo ba byed cing / sems
can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis
lam po che'i bzhi 'dor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar ba
dang / rab tu dgod pa byas na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
bzhag pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha
chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing
gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs
kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
mchan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus
dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/
de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor/
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la'ang
'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god par byed de/ de ltar yang dag par bskul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes
bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can
thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ tshu rol
tam/ pha rol tu mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can
thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la yang dag par bskul te bzhag cing bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/

gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god

dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/
skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste bkod par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de la
ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste/ bkod pa yod dam/
gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi
'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /
shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / nub byang gi phyogs
mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pe stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po drug cu gcig pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed de/ bdag
gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di
snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di

dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni dngo sa po med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod
par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni dngos po med pa'i
