gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam par rtse ba ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba bzang po

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba'i rgyal
mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni

chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad mi

'gyur ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas

shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de la chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos kyi dbyings su rtog par 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan nges par 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de

la rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams
cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ /ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams

cad la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting
nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / bsod nams kyi tshogs kun 'dzin cing chud mi za bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal pos
bde bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po thams cad bde bar 'jog cing 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po
bde bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer
rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / snyoms par
'jug pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / spyod pa thams cad rjes su dran zhing nyams par mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed

pas 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer gyis sems can gyi khams snang bar byed cing sngon gyi spyod pa rjes su dran par

byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad kyi brtson pa'i mthu bskyed par byed pa ste/ 'di ni brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par bkod pa ste/ 'di ni dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nges pa'i
tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i
tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
'dzin thams cad kyi tshig bla dwags la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la phyogs rnam par lta ba
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de
la phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya yongs su
'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste/
'di ni nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du zhing khong du chud par 'dod pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyal po'i phyag rgya
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / don thams cad nges par bsgrub pa la ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgyas 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa lta bu ste/
'di ni rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams
cad kyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'khor
gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngor 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul du
mi gnas pa ste/ 'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
gnas shing / ji ltar rgyal mtshan dam pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin thams cad las 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dbang
po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa ste/ 'di ni dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
de la rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / rgyun gyi rjes su ma log par yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ 'di ni rgyun gyi

rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / rdul dang dri ma thams cad rab tu spangs

pa'i dbang du gyur cing / ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du dbang thob pas bsgyings pa lta bu ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la seng ge rnam par skyong
ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / cho 'phrul dam pa'i dbang thob pas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med cing / bdud thams cad kyi dpung 'jig cing
'dul bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par skyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
spobs pa dam pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du bag tsha ba med par mu stegs can log par ldan pa thams cad 'dul ba ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /de la snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams rgyun gcod par byed pa ste/ 'di ni snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /de la chags pa dang thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad la 'dzin pa dang thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ni chags

pa dang thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu

sel ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
chos gang yang 'tshol ba med pa ste/ 'di ni 'tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
gnas shing / chos gang yang gnas la brten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems med pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems kyang mi 'byung sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bdud
bzhi 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / bdud bzhi'i dgra thams cad 'dul bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni bdud bzhi 'dul ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma med par byed pa ste/ 'di

ni dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od

mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od byed

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni

dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba ste/ 'di ni

'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur

ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed
pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad shes pa
dang / zad mi shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang dpal gyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad pa dang bral ba
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad mi shes par rjes su mthong nas/ rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar
mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
'dzin thams cad mi g.yo mi 'gul rab tu mi 'byed/ rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / mnyam par bzhag pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /de la zla ba dri med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mun pa med par byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma med pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mig yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / mig lnga yongs su dag par byed pa ste/ 'di ni mig
yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa
thams cad sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge

'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
'dzin de la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba dang zla ba bzhin du gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ye shes dpal
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpal yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni ye shes dpal zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid
kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar khong du chud par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems mi g.yo rnam par mi g.yo rnam par mi ldog /yongs su yi chad par mi 'gyur/ nyams su mi bde ba med la/ de la sems
zhes bya ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems mi 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin chen mtha' ltar kun nas snang ba ste/ 'di ni rin chen
mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgya med pa'i
mthas phyag rgyas btab pa nye bar bzung bas phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa
nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi
dga' ba spong ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
chos thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos
kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'phags shing yongs su rgyas pa ste/
'di ni chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de
la gnas shing / yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi 'byung khungs su gyur pa ste/ 'di ni rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'jig rten gyi rtsod pa dang / 'khrug pa rnam pa sna tshogs spong ba ste/ 'di ni 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de
la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste/ 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
to/ /de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab
tu 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid nges par 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dri ma med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
'dzin de la gnas shing / spyod pa mtha' yas pa rnam par dag par bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni dri ma med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de
la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang dmigs pa med pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmigs pa chad par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni
dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa ste/
'di ni 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang dmigs
pa med pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad
kyi ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par byed pa ste/ 'di ni ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bya ba

dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / bya ba thams cad kun spong ba ste/ 'di ni bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ming nges
par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni yang dag par dmigs su med cing tha snyad la bltos pa tsam mo zhes
rtog par 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
'dzin thams cad kyi gnas dmigs pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba ste/ 'di ni rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la g.yo ba med
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di
ni yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams
cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems med par
gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems mi 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
to/ de la nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin de dag la sems nges par gnas kyang / de'i mtshan nyid dmigs su med
par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting
nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de
la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni
byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams
cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mtha' yas sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
'dzin de la gnas shing / ji ltar sgron ma gsal bas chos thams cad rab tu snang bar byed pa de lta bu ste/ 'di ni mtha' yas sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mi mnyam pa
dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / khams gsum pa thams cad las
yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad la nem nur rnam par sel ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/
'di ni gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang gnyis
su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam
pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spyod pa dam pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / snyoms par 'jug pa de las spyod pa dam pa sna tshogs ston kyang / gang la yang 'dzin pa med pa ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dam
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams
cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas/ de la zhugs pa'i phyir khong du mi chud pa gang yang med pa ste/ 'di ni rtogs pas srid pa gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi brda dang sgra la 'jug pa ste/ 'di
ni brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'gyur ba dang 'jigs pa med cing
yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i rin chen rgyud dam pa sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad la chags pa med pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos gang la'ang chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad la chags pa med
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyed pas mun pa mun nag
sel ba dang / gzhan yang yon tan mtha' yas pa brgya 'god pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags mtha' yas pa spong ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

de la chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /de la ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos rnams kyi chos dang gang zag la bdag med par
gsal bar ston pa ste/ 'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de
la gnas shing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul phyir mi ldog pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa dam pa bsgrub pa ste/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yi ge dang bral bar rjes su mthong ba

ste/ 'di ni sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad

gzi brjid kyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mngon par dmigs pa
med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par dmigs pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mngon par
dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa 'thob

pa ste/ 'di ni ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
'dzin thams cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya kun tu 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bde ba dang sdug
bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang dag par rjes su

mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad par rung bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzungs

kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la
yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag pa dang / log par yang
dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa dang / log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi
bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'gal ba dang

'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
'dzin thams cad la mthun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snying po dang ldan

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

to/ /de la zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs

su rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / dag cing
gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems can gyi ris snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas

shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyan chen po dang ldan par 'gyur pa ste/ 'di ni rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gdung ba med pa'i glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting

nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems can gyi ris snang bar byas shing mun pa mun nag gi tsha ba'i gdung ba sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni gdung ba med pa'i glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa
ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'jig

rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skyob pa ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs/ rtse gcig kyang mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdul med
cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad rdul can dang rdul dang bral bar
mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa dang
bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye
bar mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting
nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snod las
rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / mnyam par bzhag pa'i mthus yon tan mang po bskyed de/ ji ltar lha dag bsod nams kyi mthus kha zas
mang po dag snod las rang 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta bu ste/ 'di ni snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tha ba ma lus par sreg pa ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ye
shes chen po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ye shes kyi 'od kyis thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /de la stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa

ste/ 'di ni stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi

don du dam pa'i chos kyi sgo phye bas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po las myur du sgrol ba ste/ 'di ni sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ngag gi skyon

rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par

'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi

ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la

gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yid kyi las mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/

ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi dbang po'i bye brag la kun tu rtog cing grol bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin du sems can rnams la snyoms par phan 'dogs pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nam
mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol

zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u brgyad pa'o// //rab 'byor/ gzhan

yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
dang / sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /de la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus
la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa
dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi nang gi lus la de
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par
spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/
dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi'i tshor
ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par

bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam
par mi rtog go /nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang
yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi'i sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta
zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par
spyod kyang / sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams
la rnam par mi rtog go /nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags
sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi'i chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang chos dang
ldan pa rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang
ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /rab 'byor/ ji ltar
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro'o
zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /de'i lus nyams bde ba dang
nyams mi bde'ang rung ste/ ji lta ji ltar gnas pa/ de lta de ltar nges par rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod
do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /de 'gro'am 'ong yang shes
bzhin du spyod pa yin/ lta 'am rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum mam brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ sbyar ma dang lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin
du spyod pa yin/ zos pa dang 'chos pa dang 'thungs pa dang / myangs pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nyal ba dang gnyid kyi mya myo bsal ba la'ang shes
bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'greng ba dang 'dug pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ gnyid kyis log gam/ ma log na'ang shes
bzhin du spyod pa yin/ smra ba dang mi smra na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa
dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu na'ang / dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na'ang / dran zhing dbugs

phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs nang du ring du rgyu na'ang / dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na'ang / dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes

bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu na'ang / dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyu na'ang / phyir dbugs thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu
shes te/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'am/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni/ ring du bskor na ring du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu
shes so/ /thung ngu bskor na thung ngu bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
dran par dbugs nang du brgyus na'ang / dran par dbugs nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran par dbugs phyir brgyus na'ang / dran par dbugs phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu
shes so/ /dbugs ring du nang du brgyus na'ang / dbugs ring du nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs ring du phyir brgyus na'ang / dbugs ring du phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar
rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus na'ang / dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus na'ang / dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus so zhes
bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus
kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa ngan pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal
cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/ /
chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
ba lang gi shen pa'am/ ba lang gi shen pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon po thogs te/ ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshags te/ de ltar so sor phye nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste/
de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang / lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/ /chu'i khams dang /
me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'greng ngam 'dug ste/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/
dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang klad pa man chad du sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar
yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying
dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / tshil dang /

snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya
bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chun pa'i sgye snod til dang / yungs kar dang sran chung dang / bal sran dang / nas dang / gro dang /
'bras dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig gis phye ste/ bltas na 'di ni til lo/ /'di ni yungs kar ro/ /'di ni sran chung ngo / /'di ni bal sran no/ /'di ni nas
so/ /'di ni gro'o/ /'di ni 'bras so/ /'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang / spyi bo man chad sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar
yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang /
mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtshor pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / tshil
dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang
yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go/ //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug cu rtsa bzhi pa/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs/ dur khrod du bor ba/ ro'i mal du bsnyal ba/ shi nas zhag gcig lon
pa'am/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag gsum lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am/ rnam par bam pa'am/ rnam par bsngos
pa'am/ rnam par rnags pa 'am/ rnam par zos pa'am/ rnam par 'thor ba mthong na/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can no/ /'di lta bu'i rang
bzhin can te/ chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid
mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod du bor
ba'i ro/ shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag bdun lon pa'am/ bya rog gam/ khwa 'am/ 'ol ba'am/ bya rgod dam/ spyang ki'am/ /wa'am
khyi'am/ de ma yin pa'i srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis bza' ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang de lta bu'i chos can/ de lta
bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid de lta bu las ma 'das so zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags
sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe/ nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos pa/ mi gtsang bas rnags pa/ sungs pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang tshul 'di lta bu'i chos
can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags
sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur

khrod kyi rus pa/ keng rus sha ra ri dang / khrag ra ri chags pa/ rgyus pas brang breng du 'brel ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can/
'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems
dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod
kyi rus pa keng rus sha dang khrag med pa/ rgyus pa'i gzungs med pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta
bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang
ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus gzungs med pa gyes pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa/ sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong ba de'i tshe/
de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog
go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta
zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa sa la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor ba/ rkang pa'i
rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ byin pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ tshigs pa'i rus
pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ mjing pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ mgo'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor ba mthong na/ de
lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/
de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus
can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa/ rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa/ dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de
lus 'di nyid kyang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das
pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /
rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa rab rib snang ba/ sngon por
gyur pa thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/ zegs pa brul ba sa'i rdul dang 'gran 'gren du gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i
chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig
rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/
dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam
par spyod do/ /phyi'i tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang
yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang
ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson
'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi'i
sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde
ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/
'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes
bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi'i chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes
su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi chos la
de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal
cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
po ni/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sdig to mi dge
ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam
'debs so/ /sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /
yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu
bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/
de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs te/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong
ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo/ /
brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas
yongs su grub pa bsgom mo/ /sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas
pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo/ /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas
pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar dbang po lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran
pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab
'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar stobs lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs
dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed
pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod
chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag
byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang
chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa
byed do/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson
'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas
yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/
rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/
'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di'ang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang
dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs
su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
dag pa'i ngag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /
yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dben
pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag
pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dben pa la gnas
pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba
gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags
dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag
pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dben pa la gnas
pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge
'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas
pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di'ang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin
gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mtshan ma
med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med do zhes mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa smon pa med pa rnam par
thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo de dag la zhum pa med par dran par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig
gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su
rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/ /de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa'o/ /de la kun
'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa'o/ /de la lam
shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes bya'o/ /de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad par shes pa'o/ /de la mi skye ba
shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rgyud skye ba med par shes pa'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing shes pa'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang
zhe na/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus mi rtag ces bya
bar shes pa dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro mi
rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mig gi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs kyi khams mi
rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar
shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi
rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg bya'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya
bar shes pa dang / yid kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa
dang / sa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chu'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / me'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bya bar
shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ma rig pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / 'du byed
mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye mched drug mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /
reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sred pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / len pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes
pa dang / srid pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rga shi mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o/ /de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan dang
gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o/ /de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gis lam shes pa dang / yongs su byang ba shes pa'o/ /de la sgra ji bzhin gshegs pa gang
zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yongs su ma shes
pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o/ /de la yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes
par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o/ /de la yongs su shes pa'i
dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa yongs su shes par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag mi slo ba pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas

shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod
pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i
chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di
ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis
pa'i bar te/ 'di ni rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam
gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa'o/ /'di ni mi rtag mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa

dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran
pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
